text: @SecPompeo Still pushing the false narrative that China was covering up #COVID19 although its long been debunked. Inciting fear to bring the Europe to support the US hegemony. Who still believes the US narrative? Is this what the US call diplomacy? US hegemony is crumbling! https://t.co/Ac6Yti06TU
